title: Rent a Car
description: Visit our office to pick up your reserved car. Bring your ID and reservation confirmation.

title: Return a Car
description: Return the car to the designated car park. Ensure all personal belongings are removed.

title: Inspection & Payment
description: Our team will inspect the car for damages. You will receive the final bill, including any additional charges.

title: Car Inspection
description: Our employees will inspect the car for any damages. If damages are found, they will be added to your final bill.

title: Final Payment
description: Pay the final bill, including the rental cost and any additional charges for damages or extra services.

title: 1. Choose Your Car
description: Select from our wide range of vehicles.

title: 2. Book Online
description: Reserve your car in just a few clicks.

title: 3. Pick Up & Drive
description: Collect your car and hit the road!

title: Wide Range of Cars
description: Choose from a variety of cars to suit your needs.

title: Affordable Prices
description: Get the best deals and discounts on rentals.

title: 24/7 Support
description: We're here to help you anytime, anywhere.
